Combat
Hit Points: 21 Armor Class: 18 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 15 (strength; trained)
Armor: Breastplate Shield: Tower (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Battle Axe (+7 1d8+2 S; strength; expert); Longbow (+6 1d8 P [Crit +d10] R100'; dexterity; expert); Scythe (+7 1d10+2 S [Crit +d10]; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Attack Of Opportunity: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Exacting Strike: (1) Strike does not count toward multiple attack penalty on failure
Reactive Shield: (R) Performs Raise A Shield to absorb damage from a melee Strike
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Save: Fortitude: +8 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +6 (dexterity; expert); Will: +4 (wisdom; trained)
